wikipedia_page.main: Ludovic "Ludo" Stuart was a Scottish rugby union player.He was capped eight times for Scotland between 1923 and 1930. He also played for Edinburgh Academicals.He was the brother of Charles Stuart who was also capped for Scotland in the pre-World War I period.

response: * Ludovic Stuart, Scottish rugby union player
His younger brother Ludovic Stuart was also capped for Scotland in the 1920s.
